Content: Troops of 653 Brigade of the 65 Division under the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) recently carryout a community project. To maintain religious harmony in the area, troops of 21 Sri Lanka Light Infantry under 653 Bridge organized a Shramadana to clean the Uilankulam Pulleyar Kovil premises. More than 52 troops participated in the Shramadana.
